Html:
Hello,

I am enable to access my database on local net, i'am writting application to access this database from 2 computer's,

tank's for your help.

Since that's beyond the scope of "samples questions", your best bet will be to seek help in the SQL Server forums: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/sqlserver/bb671079.aspx Possibly the getting started forum. Try looking for "surface area configuration" and/or "network configuration [SQL Server]" in BOL. There are lots more helpful articles in Books Online, too, and complete books published by MSPress and others to get you started.
